Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Indiana
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted WB: 63rd, Prairie, 60th, Michigan, and 63rd; EB: 63rd, State, 61st, Prairie, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, street blockage near 63rd/Indiana.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Prairie, 60th, Michigan, and 63rd. 

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, State, 61st, Prairie, and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with res. delays following an earlier sick customer at Conservatory-Central Park Drive. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with res. delays following an earlier sick customer at Conservatory-Central Park Drive.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.
